paper_abstract: Hyperlink structure of the Web provides valuable information for ranking query results and has been used in some famous search engines. The development of search engines such as personalized and topic-sensitive search intensifies the need of quick rank algorithms. In this paper, a link based rank called ExpRank is proposed. It can converge quickly and reserve the fundamental features of PageRank. Experimental results comparing with PageRank on real dataset are also discussed.
paper_title: A quick rank based on Web structure
